txt.en: The entrance to the crypts beneath the Lost Temple is guarded by a pair of powerful Angmarim. Brother and sister, Angaidh and Sidhág complement each other in battle, wielding both spell and blade with dark power.\n\nTo earn this deed, both siblings must fall within ten seconds of each other.
To earn this deed, you must defeat Angaidh and Sidhág within 10 seconds of each other.
Defeat Angaidh and Sidhág within ten seconds of each other
Discover the entrance to the Lost Temple
To earn this deed, you must defeat Angaidh and Sidhág within 10 seconds of each other.
You have defeated Angaidh and Sidhág within ten seconds of each other.
